# CBMutils

[`CBMutils`](https://github.com/PredictiveEcology/CBMutils/tree/development) is a package available on GitHub. It provides several core utilities to [spadesCBM](https://github.com/PredictiveEcology/spadesCBM). As with [spadesCBM](https://github.com/PredictiveEcology/spadesCBM) and its modules, development is ongoing.
